alert.note: Alert for Camp; Franklin; Smith; Titus; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:37AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Smith, southern Franklin, Wood, western Upshur, southern Titus and Camp Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 736 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Lake Fork Reservoir to 6 miles south of Grand Saline to near Malakoff. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tyler, Gilmer, Mineola, Pittsburg, Winnsboro, Leesburg, Lindale, Quitman, Big Sandy, Hawkins, Scroggins, Lake Fork Reservoir, Pleasant Grove, Hainesville, Golden, Rosewood, Hoard, Newsome, Lake Palestine and Noonday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for northeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Camp; Franklin; Smith; Titus; Upshur; Wood
